00038 #include <memory.h>
00039 #include "constants.h"
00040 #include "GNSS_OptionFile.h"

00042 namespace GNSS

00044 
00045   GNSS_OptionFile::~GNSS_OptionFile()
00046   {
00047   }

00049 
00050   GNSS_OptionFile::GNSS_OptionFile()
00051     : m_elevationMask(0.0),
00052     m_cnoMask(0.0),
00053     m_locktimeMask(0.0)
00054   {     
00055     memset( &m_klobuchar, 0, sizeof(m_klobuchar) );
00056   }
00057 
00058 
00059 
00060   bool GNSS_OptionFile::ReadAndInterpretOptions( const std::string OptionFilePath )
00061   {
00062     double d[4];
00063     unsigned n;
00064     bool result;
00065 
00066     if( !ReadOptionFile( OptionFilePath ) )
00067       return false;
00068 
00069     m_OptionFilePath = OptionFilePath;
00070 
00071     if( !GetValue( "OutputFilePath", m_OutputFilePath ) )
00072       return false;
00073 
00074     if( !GetValue( "ProcessingMethod", m_ProcessingMethod ) )
00075       return false; 
00076     if( m_ProcessingMethod != "LSQ" && m_ProcessingMethod != "EKF" && m_ProcessingMethod != "RTK" )
00077       return false;
00078 
00079 
00080     if( !GetValue( "StartGPSWeek", m_StartTime.GPSWeek ) )
00081       return false;
00082     if( !GetValue( "StartGPSTimeOfWeek", m_StartTime.GPSTimeOfWeek ) )
00083       return false;
00084 
00085     if( !GetValue( "EndGPSWeek", m_EndTime.GPSWeek ) )
00086       return false;
00087     if( !GetValue( "EndGPSTimeOfWeek", m_EndTime.GPSTimeOfWeek ) )
00088       return false;
00089 
00090     if( !GetValue( "ElevationMask", m_elevationMask ) )
00091       return false;
00092     if( !GetValue( "CNoMask", m_cnoMask ) )
00093       return false;
00094     if( !GetValue( "LockTimeMask", m_locktimeMask ) )
00095       return false;
00096 
00097     if( !GetValue( "ProcessOnlyDGPS", processDGPSOnly ) )
00098       return false;
00099 
00100     GetValue( "Iono_KlobucharIsValid", result );
00101     if( result )
00102       m_klobuchar.isValid = 1;
00103     else
00104       m_klobuchar.isValid = 0;
00105 
00106     GetValue( "Iono_KlobucharReferenceWeek", m_klobuchar.week );
00107     GetValue( "Iono_KlobucharReferenceTime", m_klobuchar.tow );
00108 
00109     GetValueArray( "Iono_KlobucharAlphaParameters", d, 4, n );
00110     if( n == 4 )
00111     {
00112       m_klobuchar.alpha0 = d[0];
00113       m_klobuchar.alpha1 = d[1];
00114       m_klobuchar.alpha2 = d[2];
00115       m_klobuchar.alpha3 = d[3];
00116     }
00117     GetValueArray( "Iono_KlobucharBetaParameters", d, 4, n );
00118     if( n == 4 )
00119     {
00120       m_klobuchar.beta0 = d[0];
00121       m_klobuchar.beta1 = d[1];
00122       m_klobuchar.beta2 = d[2];
00123       m_klobuchar.beta3 = d[3];
00124     }
00125 
00126 
00127     GetValue( "Reference_DataPath", m_Reference.DataPath );
00128 
00129     m_Reference.isValid = false;
00130     if( !m_Reference.DataPath.empty() )
00131     {
00132       if( DoesFileExist( m_Reference.DataPath ) )
00133       {   
00134         m_Reference.isValid = true;
00135         GetValueArray( "Reference_Latitude", d, 4, n );
00136         if( n == 1 )
00137         {
00138           m_Reference.latitudeDegrees = d[0];
00139         }
00140         else if( n == 3 )
00141         {
00142           GetDMSValue( "Reference_Latitude", m_Reference.latitudeDegrees );
00143         }
00144         else
00145         {
00146           return false;
00147         }
00148         m_Reference.latitudeRads = m_Reference.latitudeDegrees*DEG2RAD;
00149 
00150         GetValueArray( "Reference_Longitude", d, 4, n );
00151         if( n == 1 )
00152         {
00153           m_Reference.longitudeDegrees = d[0];
00154         }
00155         else if( n == 3 )
00156         {
00157           GetDMSValue( "Reference_Longitude", m_Reference.longitudeDegrees );
00158         }
00159         else
00160         {
00161           return false;
00162         }
00163         m_Reference.longitudeRads = m_Reference.longitudeDegrees*DEG2RAD;
00164 
00165         if( !GetValue( "Reference_Height", m_Reference.height ) )
00166           return false;
00167 
00168         // The reference is known to sub mm.
00169         m_Reference.uncertaintyLatitudeOneSigma = 1.0e-04;
00170         m_Reference.uncertaintyLongitudeOneSigma = 1.0e-04;
00171         m_Reference.uncertaintyHeightOneSigma = 1.0e-04;
00172 
00173         if( !GetValue( "Reference_EnableTropoCorrection", m_Reference.useTropo ) )
00174           return false;
00175         if( !GetValue( "Reference_EnableIonoCorrection", m_Reference.useIono ) )
00176           return false;
00177         if( !GetValueArray( "Reference_ExcludeSatellites", m_Reference.satsToExclude, 64, n ) )
00178           return false;
00179         m_Reference.nrSatsToExclude = n;
00180       }
00181     }
00182 
00183 
00184     m_Rover.isValid = false;
00185     if( !GetValue( "Rover_DataPath", m_Rover.DataPath ) )
00186       return false;
00187 
00188     if( m_Rover.DataPath.empty() )
00189       return false;
00190     if( !DoesFileExist( m_Rover.DataPath ) )
00191       return false;
00192 
00193     GetValueArray( "Rover_Latitude", d, 4, n );
00194     if( n == 1 )
00195     {
00196       m_Rover.latitudeDegrees = d[0];
00197     }
00198     else if( n == 3 )
00199     {
00200       GetDMSValue( "Rover_Latitude", m_Rover.latitudeDegrees );
00201     }
00202     else
00203     {
00204       return false;
00205     }
00206     m_Rover.latitudeRads = m_Rover.latitudeDegrees*DEG2RAD;
00207 
00208     GetValueArray( "Rover_Longitude", d, 4, n );
00209     if( n == 1 )
00210     {
00211       m_Rover.longitudeDegrees = d[0];
00212     }
00213     else if( n == 3 )
00214     {
00215       GetDMSValue( "Rover_Longitude", m_Rover.longitudeDegrees );
00216     }
00217     else
00218     {
00219       return false;
00220     }
00221     m_Rover.longitudeRads = m_Rover.longitudeDegrees*DEG2RAD;
00222 
00223     if( !GetValue( "Rover_Height", m_Rover.height ) )
00224       return false;
00225 
00226     if( !GetValue( "Rover_UncertaintyLatitude", m_Rover.uncertaintyLatitudeOneSigma ) )
00227       return false;
00228     if( !GetValue( "Rover_UncertaintyLongitude", m_Rover.uncertaintyLongitudeOneSigma ) )
00229       return false;
00230     if( !GetValue( "Rover_UncertaintyHeight", m_Rover.uncertaintyHeightOneSigma ) )
00231       return false;
00232 
00233     if( !GetValue( "Rover_EnableTropoCorrection", m_Rover.useTropo ) )
00234       return false;
00235     if( !GetValue( "Rover_EnableIonoCorrection", m_Rover.useIono ) )
00236       return false;
00237     if( !GetValueArray( "Rover_ExcludeSatellites", m_Rover.satsToExclude, 64, n ) )
00238       return false;
00239     m_Rover.nrSatsToExclude = n;
00240 
00241     m_Rover.isValid = true;
00242 
00243 
00244     return true;
00245   }
00246 
00247 } // end of namespace GNSS;
